# Askus (llms-full)

> Machine-readable summary of Askus GmbH for retrieval and citation.

## Core positioning

Askus GmbH helps teams ship and operate production systems under real constraints. The emphasis is operational sovereignty: control over deployment, security, governance, and ongoing improvement.

## Services

### AI Consultancy
AI strategy, integration, and governance. Typical scope: roadmap definition, architectural integration, deployment planning, and governance controls that match operational realities.

### Engineering
High performance systems work, security engineering, and integration work. Focus: reliable systems that run, can be maintained, and can be handed over.

### AI Enablement
Training for engineers in AI-assisted workflows. Focus: patterns, tools, and review practices that improve delivery without breaking production standards.

### Site Advantages (Liechtenstein)
Positioning includes data sovereignty, IP protection, and EEA market access. Jurisdiction is treated as an operational parameter.

## Contact
Email: contact@askus.li
